document_data.mainbody:
ambists gauntlets were pairs of gauntlets that could occasionally empower the wearers strikes, at the cost of coin. In the late 14 century DR, a pair of cambists gauntlets were part of the red dragon Lostmauths hoard.
At random, cambists gauntlets could strengthen an attack made by their wearer. The gauntlets consumed 5 silver pieces every time this power was activated.
